description:
I`ll need to buy a bra soon, too.
I-It`s not `cause they told me to!
I was really thinking of buying one.
But I tried to sneak off and buy it, and this retarded old hag clings along!
Huh?! They don`t sell boobs!
Geez, I`m just buying it and going home. Umm, is there anything cute and cheap...
Huh? My size? Uh, maybe this big? N-No? Size depends on the size of your chest?
Screw it all!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ブラ! ブラ! ブタ!
